title: Royal Delight
summaries: The Royal Delight is a pet-summoning item which is dropped by King Slime in Master Mode with a 25*1/4 (25%) chance. It summons a pet Slime Prince which follows the player around. The pet resembles a miniature King Slime with blush and small dotted eyes.
